docs.abstract: The influence of organized labor in the United States has drastically declined, but it can still make a difference.

headline.main: Assessing One Possible Change to the Affordable Care Act

docs.abstract: The Save American Workers Act would raise the threshold for full-time work — and eligibility for employer-sponsored health insurance — from 30 hours to 40 hours a week.
docs.snippet: The Save American Workers Act would raise the threshold for full-time work — and eligibility for employer-sponsored health insurance — from 30 hours to 40 hours a week.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republicans will use their new dominance of Congress to repeal or cut back President Barack Obama's health care reforms, approve the Keystone XL oil pipeline and trim the nation's debt, House of Representatives Speaker John Boehner said on Thursday.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama will add a popular Kentucky Democrat to his team at the White House, naming Jerry Abramson, the state's lieutenant governor who was mayor of Louisville for 21 years, as director of intergovernmental affairs.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama has chosen Kentucky's lieutenant governor as his liaison to state and local governments, bringing an official experienced in successfully implementing his health care law to the White House as the second open enrollment period is set to kick off.

docs.lead_paragraph: Today is Friday, Nov. 7, the 311th day of 2014. There are 54 days left in the year.

docs.lead_paragraph: We painlessly inherited democracy, but by allowing political dysfunction to set in, we’ve botched it.
docs.abstract: Nicholas Kristof Op-Ed column contends the American political system is broken; posits that Americans painlessly inherited democracy, yet have botched it by allowing political dysfunction to set in, and no one should be celebrating; points out one bright spot in midterms was voter action on ballot measures.
docs.snippet: We painlessly inherited democracy, but by allowing political dysfunction to set in, we’ve botched it.
